name: Shadow Jumper (Mika Geebelen)
description:
Shadow Jumper is a fast-paced endless platformer game.

You are a one-eyed creature climbing a tower. Using your special vision you can determine if a platform is real or not. Some platforms will be just regular platforms, others will be trapped with spikes that only will reveal themselves after you have looked at the platform. You gain points for each layer you ascend but you don't have all day to climb the tower. Make sure you are faster then the mist or you will be eliminated.

There are 5 different platform types
- regular platforms
- fading platforms 
- spiked platforms
- crumbling platforms 
- portal platforms

Master all the platform types, get used to the looking mechanic, navigate your way up and get the highest score possible.
